channel.title: QBD Reward Chest, Please help!
channel.description: Hello, What I want to do is setup the Reward chest so that when you click the Bank all button ([url=http://prntscr.com/92tgt5]HERE[/url]) It sends the items to the bank. At the moment it does not do anything. I'm using 718 and source is Entrinthy (Matrix) :)

item.title: QBD Reward Chest, Please help!
item.dc:creator: @Dnrky Dnrky
item.description:
@Dnrky wrote:

Alright, thats all I needed thank you!

Read full topic

item.title: QBD Reward Chest, Please help!
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

I don’t use 718, so what I say will be rather obscure.

What you need to do is enable debugging, or add debugging, to tell you the id of the button you’re pressing.

Next, open up your bank and press the deposit all button in there. The id should print out…

Look for the id in your button handling packet (In a 317 server, it’s called ClickingButtons), and then use that code as a reference for your rewards chest. Don’t forget to get the id of the button on the interface by clicking it.

There will obviously be differences in the code. I.E: You will iterate over the rewards in the chest instead of the player inventory/bank.

Read full topic
